verses.text: 耶穌基督的啟示，就是 神賜給他，叫他把快要發生的事指示他的眾僕人。他就差派天使顯示給他的僕人約翰。

words.note: The empty space is an honorific in older Chinese Bibles.
Often used for gifts from a superior to an inferior.
Introduces object of action.
Often implies instruction or direction.
Often used in formal or biblical contexts for a multitude.
Used for official or authoritative sending.
Literally 'heavenly messenger'.

verses.heading: The Prologue

verses.text: 約翰把 神的道，和耶穌基督的見證，凡是自己所看見的，都見證出來了。

words.note: Introduces object of action.
The empty space is an honorific in older Chinese Bibles.
In a biblical context, often refers to God's Word or Christ as the Logos.
Can also be a verb 'to testify'.
Often used to form noun phrases with verbs.
Verb complement indicating emergence or accomplishment.
Indicates completion or change of state.

verses.text: 讀這書上預言的人，和那些聽見這預言並且遵守書中記載的人，都是有福的！因為時候近了。

words.note: Used as a locative suffix here.
Can also be a verb 'to prophesy'.
Used to nominalize adjectives or phrases.
Indicates change of state or new situation.

verses.text: 約翰寫信給在亞西亞的七個教會。願恩惠平安，從那位今在、昔在、以後要來的 神，從他寶座前的七靈，

words.note: A theological term for God's eternal present existence.
A theological term for God's eternal past existence.
The empty space is an honorific in older Chinese Bibles.
Used as a locative noun 'in front of'.
Refers to the sevenfold Spirit of God in Revelation.

verses.text: 又從那信實的見證人、死人中首先復生的、地上眾君王的統治者耶穌基督臨到你們。他愛我們，用自己的血把我們從我們的罪中釋放出來，

words.note: Used as a locative suffix.
Often used in formal or biblical contexts for a multitude.
Often implies a significant arrival or condescension.
Introduces object of action.
Used as a locative suffix.
Verb complement indicating emergence or accomplishment.

verses.text: 又使我們成為國度，作他父 神的祭司。願榮耀權能都歸給他，直到永永遠遠。阿們。

words.note: Refers to a divine or earthly domain.
Refers to the Judeo-Christian God.
Lit. 'power and ability'.
A reduplication for emphasis on eternity.
Hebrew word meaning 'so be it'.

verses.text: 看哪，他駕著雲降臨，每一個人都要看見他，連那些刺過他的人也要看見他，地上的萬族都要因他哀號。這是必定的，阿們。

words.note: Used to draw attention, similar to 'lo!' or 'behold!'.
Turns adjective phrase into a noun phrase.
Hebrew word meaning 'so be it'.

verses.text: 主 神說：「我是阿拉法，我是俄梅格；我是今在、昔在、以後要來，全能的 神。」

words.note: Title for God or Jesus.
Refers to the Judeo-Christian God.
Transliteration of Greek 'Alpha', first letter of alphabet.
Transliteration of Greek 'Omega', last letter of alphabet.
Literally 'now existing'.
Literally 'past existing'.
Refers to the Judeo-Christian God.

verses.text: 我約翰，就是你們的弟兄，在耶穌裡跟你們一同分享患難、國度和忍耐的，為了 神的道和耶穌的見證，曾經在那名叫拔摩的海島上。

words.note: Often used for fellow believers.
Refers to a divine or earthly domain.
Turns a descriptive phrase into a noun-like entity.
Refers to the Judeo-Christian God.
In biblical context, often refers to God's message or Logos.
Used as a localizer particle here.

verses.text: 有一個主日，我在靈裡，聽見在我後邊有一個大聲音，好像號筒的響聲，

words.note: Refers to Sunday, the day of Christian worship.

verses.text: 說：「你所看見的，要寫在書上，也要寄給以弗所、士每拿、別迦摩、推雅推拉、撒狄、非拉鐵非、老底嘉七個教會。」

words.note: Indicates the object of a verb or a noun clause

verses.text: 我轉過身來要看看那跟我說話的聲音是誰發的；一轉過來，就看見七個金燈臺。

words.note: Reduplication for a casual or brief action
Used in the '一...就...' structure
Used in the '一...就...' structure

verses.text: 燈臺中間有一位好像人子的，身上穿著直垂到腳的長衣，胸間束著金帶。

words.note: A messianic title for Jesus Christ

verses.text: 他的頭和頭髮像白羊毛、像雪一樣潔白，他的眼睛好像火燄，
他的兩腳好像在爐中精煉過的發光的銅，他的聲音好像眾水的聲音。
他的右手拿著七星，有一把兩刃的利劍從他口中吐出來；他的臉發光好像正午的烈日。

words.note: Indicates continuous action.
Verb with directional complement.

verses.text: 我看見了他，就仆倒在他腳前，像死了一樣。他用右手按著我，說：「不要怕！我是首先的，我是末後的，

words.note: Often used in religious contexts for falling before a deity.
Lit. 'foot-front'.

verses.text: 又是永活的；我曾經死過，看哪，現在又活著，直活到永永遠遠，並且拿著死亡和陰間的鑰匙。

words.note: A reduplicated idiom emphasizing eternity.
Indicates continuous action.

verses.text: 所以，你要把所看見的，現在的，和今後將要發生的事都寫下來。

words.note: Used to prepose the direct object before the verb.
Forms a nominal phrase with the following verb.
Indicates future tense.
Verb with directional complement.

verses.text: 你所看見在我右手中的七星和七個金燈臺的奧祕就是這樣：七星是七個教會的使者，七燈臺是七個教會。」

words.note: Forms a nominal phrase with the following verb.
Lit. 'teaching assembly'.
Refers to the seven specific lampstands mentioned earlier.
Lit. 'teaching assembly'.
